title: New Galaxy Watch 4 update rolling out with Samsung Health improvements, March patch
content:
The Galaxy Watch 4 is still, going on a year after the update’s announcement, the only product on the market with Wear OS 3. Luckily, though, it’s proven to be a solid product with great features, and even better software support. This week, Samsung is rolling out yet another Galaxy Watch 4 update, this time with some Samsung Health improvements and the March security patch.

more…

The post New Galaxy Watch 4 update rolling out with Samsung Health improvements, March patch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new update is rolling out to the Galaxy Watch 4 series, bringing with it the March 2022 security patch and improvements to the Health app.
